install.name: AcyMailing : (auto)Subscribe during Joomla registration
install.author: Acyba
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2018 ACYBA SAS - All rights reserved.
install.description: Automatically subscribe the user to AcyMailing during the Joomla registration process

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: lists
param.label: Lists displayed on registration form
param.description: The following selected lists will be added to your Joomla registration form and will be visible.

param.name: listschecked
param.label: Lists checked by default
param.description: The selected lists will be checked by default on your registration form.

param.name: subscribetext
param.label: Subscribe Caption
param.description: Text displayed for the subscription field. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: displaymode
param.label: Display mode
param.description: Select the way you want AcyMailing to display your lists
param.option: Group the lists into one checkbox
Display the lists in a dropdown

param.name: fieldafter
param.label: Display the lists after
param.description: AcyMailing will display the lists after the selected field on your registration form

param.name: fieldaftercustom
param.label: Display the lists after (custom)
param.description: If your registration page contains other fields, you can specify the name of other fields (separated with a ;) to display the lists after these custom fields (The previous option should be set to 'custom')

param.name: customfieldsafter
param.label: Display the fields after
param.description: AcyMailing will display the extra fields after the selected field on your registration form

param.name: customfieldsaftercustom
param.label: Display the fields after (custom)
param.description: If your registration page contains other fields, you can specify the name of other fields (separated with a ;) to display the lists after these custom fields (The previous option should be set to 'custom')

param.name: sendnotif
param.label: Send notification
param.description: When an user is created, send the Acy notification message

param.name: forceconf
param.label: Force double opt-in
param.description: The registration process may already have its confirmation e-mail... Do you want Acy to send its own confirmation e-mail (so in addition to the Joomla one)?

param.name: customcss
param.label: Custom CSS
param.description: You can specify here some CSS which will be added to the registration page

param.name: deletebehavior
param.label: User deletion behavior
param.description: Choose if the AcyMailing user should also be deleted when the Joomla account is deleted

param.label: Excluded components
param.name: excluded
param.description: Acy won't display the subscription lists on the components you exclude with this option. Each value should be separated by a coma, here are the possible values: com_user, com_users, com_alpharegistration, com_ccusers, com_community, com_extendedreg, com_gcontact, com_hikashop, com_jblance, com_jshopping, com_juser, com_mijoshop, com_osemsc, com_redshop, com_tienda, com_virtuemart.

param.name: addcategory
param.label: Display category name
param.description: Order the lists by category and display their category name above them.
